about_the_game:
Along came a mule…



You'd better run, because Mr. Willickers is close behind. The last of his decaying taste-buds seek the flesh and bone of your first born son.

A paramilitary band of fighters is on your side, but even their selfless sacrifice will only serve to deter the creature.

Your car is dead. Your body is waning. Your son’s fever is growing worse.

Can you hold out until rescue comes?

Fight an Insurmountable Enemy



  • 3 different weapons to find. Pistol, Shotgun, and Rifle.
  • Explore an old town abandoned to the elements.
  • Fend off a tireless beast that cannot be killed.
  • Use firearms to keep Mr. Willickers at bay in a perilous game of momentum.
  • Use Emergency Flares to summon support: Infantry, Trucks, Tanks, Tactical Missiles, and Snipers.
  • Maintain your stamina levels with snacks or by resting.
  • Mr. Willickers can perform miracles, both wonderful and profane. He can even Raise the Dead to aid him.
  • Survive until your rescue helicopter arrives.

Escaping with your son alive will be an almost impossible task. Only a worthy few will succeed.
